name: Adventure of Stickman: Fly In Space Free - Action Game
name_original: Adventure of Stickman: Fly In Space Free - Action Game
description:
Stickman is tried of running on the ground. So he goes for a space adventure. However, things are not that easy. Stickman is chased by fireball. It seems that he need some help. Can you help him? Come and join the stickman’s adventure.

Highlights:
•Addictive gameplay, easy and fun
•Tilt iPhone to control
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center Support
•It’s FREE!!!
